title: Some say we should not raise our hands when making Dua for iftar, is this true
transcript: okay abu hafs from bangladesh some say that we should not raise our hands when we make dua before the eftar this is not part of the prohibited things now this is a place of general dua the prophet told the salison that the dua of the person traveling the dua of a person breaking his fast the dua of a person at the last hour of friday all of these types of dua are answered by allah where do we get that it is not permissible to raise your hands this is totally bogus you can raise your hands without any problem
